participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Motivated, empathetic, and passionate about helping others.
participant_1.background: i got a new job just yesterday to be a life coach. i am a cancer survivor. i'm a clean eater. i love running and preparing for marathons.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.background: i volunteer my time with a local bunny rescue. my favorite color is navy blue. i work fulltime in a shipyard. i donate a part of my salary to charity each month.
